title: Void Break (Part 1)
body:
Void Break (Part 1)

"What is your name brother?" Evan asked with a friendly smile on his face.

"Malark," A middle aged man said with drool trickling down from his mouth. "What can I do for you bother?" He asked while keeping his eyes fixed on one of the untouched sandwiches on the table.

"It's nothing brother Malark. I was just bored and you seemed an interesting person so I called you here to have a nice chat." Evan said and pushed the untouched Inferno Harpy Sandwich toward Malark. "Let's talk while eating."

The eyes of the people who were paying attention to Evan turned red from jealousy when they saw Evan giving the sandwich to Malark.

Malark's body also froze because of shock and he looked at Evan with his eyes wide open.

"Y...you are giving this to me?" He asked in a trembling voice.

"What's wrong brother? Could it be that this sandwich is not to your liking?" Evan asked while raising an eyebrow.
